original_title: President Wickremesinghe to address the nation tonight (1)
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe will deliver a special statement addressing the government’s efforts over the past nine months to revive Sri Lanka’s economy, as well as outlining the forthcoming stages of the country’s social, economic, and political reform agenda.
This special statement is scheduled to be broadcast today (01) at 8:00 PM on Sirasa TV.

The objective is to provide the public with a comprehensive understanding of Sri Lanka’s national transformation roadmap and to present the proposed strategies for accomplishing the envisioned objectives, said the President's Media Division.
